alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Essex, southeastern Worcester, Norfolk, Suffolk, southeastern Middlesex and northwestern Plymouth Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hopkinton, or near Milford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Somerville, Framingham, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Weymouth, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Marlborough, Woburn and Braintree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and eastern, central, southeastern and northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
